monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Assistance
skills.description: Every heal that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 10% chance to apply Sidekick (Buff).

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Auto Restore
skills.description: When attacking, also remove 2 Debuffs from the Monster with the most Debuffs in the party.

skills.name: Blessed Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (neutral) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Blessed Strikes Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (neutral) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Combat Guard
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sidekick (Buff) and Glory (Buff) also reduce the damage taken by 7.5%.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Concealed
skills.description: During its first round, this Monster has an additional 25% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Apex
skills.description: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Critical Healing
skills.description: Healing actions can land a "Critical Heal" to heal for an increased amount, based on Critical Chance and Critical Damage. (Triggering any Crit-based skills)

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Double Strike
skills.description: On each hit, there's a 10% chance to trigger another hit with the same base damage. (Cannot trigger again on Double Strike hits)

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Elemental Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (fire/water/wind/earth) Hits all enemies, ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Enlightened
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, 55% chance to share the Buff with an allied Monster.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Fiery Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Storm
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 100% (400%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 125% (500%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Flurry of Blows
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Freezing Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Godly Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 140% (560%) physical damage (neutral) - Damage is increased by 3% for every Buff on this Monster

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Lightning Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Martial Prowess
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party evades a hit (either by dodging or by Blind), 70% chance that they gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Multi Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sidekick
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Polar Winds
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff) - Heal all allies for (700 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Power Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Quicken
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Agility & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
